definition: to form a long line (i.e. of people waiting)

sentences.english: It’s not appropriate to leave queues of taxpayers and go for lunch.
sentences.chinese: 放下排長隊的納稅人去喫午飯這實在是不怎麼合適。

sentences.english: All day they swung up and down the main street in long teams.
sentences.chinese: 從早到晚他們都排着長隊在大街上來來回回轉着。

sentences.english: People live aside usually go line up to buy its well-known juice ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 住在附近的人常常排長隊購買它家有名的果汁冰淇淋。

sentences.english: Didn't you see there are many places that have long lines?
sentences.chinese: 你沒看見好多地方都排着長隊嗎？

sentences.english: Outside, thousands of people formed up in long queues, waiting their turn to enter the hall.
sentences.chinese: 外面成千上萬的人排長隊等候進入大會堂。

sentences.english: Hour-long queues at the tills that snaked around the store were putting many shoppers off.
sentences.chinese: 商店裏蜿蜒曲折，近一小時的長隊讓很多購物者卻步。

sentences.english: Robinovitz pushed past the queue jamming the passageway outside the infirmary .
sentences.chinese: 羅賓諾維茨擠過在醫務室門外阻塞了通道的長隊。

sentences.english: you probably will have problems walking along this causeway because of the queues.
sentences.chinese: 沿着堤道走可能會有困難，因爲會排長隊。

sentences.english: For the people of Iwate Prefecture, it was long queues at supermarkets again.
sentences.chinese: 巖手縣的人再一次在超市裏排起長隊。

sentences.english: Lines were forming Thursday at Apple stores and Softbank outlets in Tokyo.
sentences.chinese: 週四，東京的蘋果門店和軟庫分支機構外排起了長隊。

sentences.english: There are long queues on petrol forecourts.
He recalls that there was a long queue outside the ticket office everyday as people lined up to buy tickets.
sentences.chinese: 每一天，買票的人們都在售票處外排起了長隊。

sentences.english: There was a long line of people at the box-office window.
sentences.chinese: 在售票處窗口外排了一長隊人。

sentences.english: Buses have been lined up to help with the evacuation of Mozambicans.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽車排成長隊幫助撤離莫桑比克人。

sentences.english: You have to go there tomorrow. Today there must be long line at the barbershop.
sentences.chinese: 你還是明天再去吧，今天理髮店裏肯定排長隊。

sentences.english: How Americans lined up to give blood.
sentences.chinese: 美國人如何排長隊獻血。
